ARTICLE.CONTENT: Pursuant to Article 440 of Regulation (EU) No 575/2013, this Regulation specifies the disclosure requirements for institutions in relation to their compliance with the requirement for a countercyclical capital buffer referred to in Chapter 4 of Title VII of Directive 2013/36/EU.
ARTICLE.SUBTITLE: Subject matter
ARTICLE.TITLE: Article 1

ARTICLE.CONTENT: The geographical distribution of an institution's credit exposures relevant for the calculation of countercyclical buffer referred to in Article 440(1)(a) of Regulation (EU) No 575/2013 shall be disclosed in the standard format as set out in Table 1 of Annex I in accordance with the instructions contained in Parts I and II of Annex II and with the provisions laid down in Delegated Regulation (EU) No 1152/2014.
ARTICLE.SUBTITLE: Disclosure of the geographical distribution of credit exposures
ARTICLE.TITLE: Article 2

ARTICLE.CONTENT: The amount of an institution's specific countercyclical buffer referred to in Article 440(1)(b) of Regulation (EU) No 575/2013 shall be disclosed in the standard format as set out in Table 2 of Annex I in accordance with the instructions contained in Parts I and III of Annex II.
ARTICLE.SUBTITLE: Disclosure of the amount of institution specific countercyclical buffer
ARTICLE.TITLE: Article 3

ARTICLE.CONTENT:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the twentieth day following that of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Union.
It shall apply from 1 January 2016.
ARTICLE.SUBTITLE: Entry into force and application
ARTICLE.TITLE: Article 4
